Articles.Content:

I call everything. MWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA.

Just kidding
No, since at the moment it appears horribly organized.
You wanna help out with that?
I recommend following Radion\'s forum as a rule example.
I mean, would you like to be an admin and help out?
Twinky, is that the only thing you do related to KSP? Role playing?

> 
> Twinky, is that the only thing you do related to KSP? Role playing?

Not related to RP.

MWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA.

>

No... I do challenges and stuff too! I just can never beat them, so I never post them.
